home.title: Hi, I'm Breno!
home.description: I'm 26 years old, based in Fortaleza - Brazil, graduated in engineering, a passionate about development and fascinated by the Digital Ecosystem. Currently working as a Front-End Developer and UI Engineer.

about.title: About
description: I've been working as a Web and Front End developer for a few years, when I decided to migrate of area, since previously I worked as a Telecommunications engineer. Everyday I discover and get fascinated for new topics in this are I chosen to work in. Nowadays, I work at Avenue Code as UI Engineer.

I've worked in a bunch projects, such as websites, e-commerces and web apps, you can take a look in a few of them on my portfolio :D In each of these projects, I try to reinvent and overcome myself, building not only an application, but a true experience aligned with the user's expectations and needs.

Not only in my professional projects, but even in my personal ones, I try to apply a bit of the knowledge from the oriental culture, which I'm fascinated since I was a child. Therefore, just like in the samurai warrior path, I'm always seeking for balance, excelence, respect, honor and courage.

list.name: NextTimer
list.description: Site desenvolvido utilizando WordPress para a Regulus Tecnologia, uma Software House com foco no desenvolvimento de sites e aplicativos. Um projeto desenvolvido por mim e um amigo da época da faculdade, que, por enquanto, está em stand by.

list.name: Regulus
list.description: Site desenvolvido utilizando WordPress para a Regulus Tecnologia, uma Software House com foco no desenvolvimento de sites e aplicativos. Um projeto desenvolvido por mim e um amigo da época da faculdade, que, por enquanto, está em stand by.

list.name: Ouse Saber
list.description: Ecommerce desenvolvido utilizando Wordpress e Woocommerce para o Ouse Saber, empresa focada na venda de cursos para concursos públicos.

list.name: Delfos IM
list.description: Site desenvolvido utilizando WordPress para a Delfos IM, uma startup que utiliza Inteligência Artificial para predizer falhas em parques eólicos. Porjeto desenvolvido na época em que estagiei lá como Desenvolvedor Front-End.
